# isInputMeteringEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the microphone’s sound level is being monitored.

## Declaration

```swift
var isInputMeteringEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], your application can read the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKVoiceChatService/inputMeterLevel] property to monitor the sound level of the microphone. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the value of the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKVoiceChatService/inputMeterLevel] property is undefined. Default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. When your application doesn’t need to monitor the microphone, it should set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to improve performance.

## Monitoring the Audio Level

- **inputMeterLevel**: The volume, in decibels (db), being received by the microphone.
- **isOutputMeteringEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the voice level of remote participants is monitored.
- **outputMeterLevel**: The volume, in decibels (db), being received from all other participants.
